item.title: Computers are to difficult to use and I'm proud of my digital illiteracy
item.description:
Computers are too difficult and people are computer illiterate

Adults have worn their computer illiteracy as a badge of pride for many years now so it shouldn't surprise anyone that their children share their digital inadequacies. Moreover, neither group is even willing to try to solve a problem when they â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
